briefTitle: Extended Treatment in Metastatic Breast Cancer With Eribulin
officialTitle: Long-term Eribulin Treatment in Metastatic Breast Cancer: A Multicenter, Case-study Analysis
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion criteria:

* Participants with Advanced or Metastatic Breast Cancer on Eribulin for at least 7 months

Exclusion criteria:

* Lack of accessible clinical records
